已知的明文信息打copper

> exp

```py
from Crypto.Util.number import *

n = 
c = 

pad1 = b'easy_problem'
pad2 = b'How_to_solve_it'
mh = bytes_to_long(pad1 + b'flag{' + b'\x00'*33 + b'}' + pad2)
R.<x> = PolynomialRing(Zmod(n))
f = (mh + x * 256^(len(pad2) + 1))^3 - c
res = f.monic().small_roots(X=256**33,beta=0.49,epsilon=0.02)
print(res)
m = mh + int(res[0]) * 256^(len(pad2) + 1)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
# flag{A_C0pper5mi1tH_4Ues7iOn_SplIt_Pad}
```
